title: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset
description: When setting aliases for columns in a data set, the expression builder still displays the old column names instead of the aliases when selecting the dataset.
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the aliases that were set for the columns in the data set.
EB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the aliases that were set for the columns in the data set should be displayed instead of the old column names.
SR:
1. Set aliases for columns in a data set.
2. Open the expression builder.
3. Select the dataset.
4. Observe that the old column names are displayed instead of the aliases.
